findings.rationale: The five-year duration may be insufficient for certain types of sensitive information that require longer protection, potentially exposing parties to risks after the term ends.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for a period of five (5) years from the date of execution.

findings.rationale: Allowing injunctive relief without posting bond may lead to potential misuse, as a party could seek immediate relief without proving the urgency or necessity.
findings.evidence_quote: the Disclosing Party shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief without posting bond or other security.

findings.rationale: Restricting assignment may limit the parties' ability to adapt to business changes, potentially impacting future transactions or partnerships.
findings.evidence_quote: Neither party may assign this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other party.
